ingredients: 2 tablespoons GREY POUPON Honey Dijon Mustard
1 pound boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cut into thin strips
instructions: Mix water, barbecue sauce, peanut butter, soy sauce, cilantro and mustard in medium bowl with wire whisk. Refrigerate half of the mixture to use as a dipping sauce. Pour remaining mixture into large resealable plastic bag. Add chicken; seal bag. Shake gently to coat chicken. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours to marinate.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Thread chicken onto 12 skewers in ribbon fashion; discard any remaining marinade in bag.
Grill 5 to 7 min. or until chicken is cooked through. Serve with the reserved dipping sauce.
title: Sizzlin' Chicken Skewers
